name: Entangl
description:
The story comic

W, A, S, D to move

E to grab objects and release E while moving to throw them.

F to entangle items on both Moon platforms (Entangling is a bit finicky, so keep trying!)

R to restart, or if something happens that prevents you from going through doors

TAB to change characters

If you have nowhere to go on, the game's over.

Two friends only know each other through the strange device in ancient ruins. It allows them to entangle objects in their respective worlds and write things on the walls to communicate.

One day they see the sky in their worlds shatter and decide to delve in the ruins in hope of finding some way to restore it.
